entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Not able to access File server from inside container running Asp.Net 4.7.2 window service #30045
  • Rationalize short and long RIDs #30041

Closed

  • `dotnet publish` shows garbled characters when running on PMC on OS with Traditional Chinese language #29151
    Backlog
  • dotnet cli produces `?`s in output #8833
    Backlog
  • .NET 8: [breaking] dotnet build/publish produces RID-specific apps by default #23540
    8.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #30061
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30060
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Port two better fixes for installer crashes from main #30057
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix NRE in installer tests #30056
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #30049
    Area-Infrastructure
  • update output path in WebProjectsTests #30048
    Area-dotnet new
  • Prevent editors from auto-trimming trailing whitespaces in test approval files #30044
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Breaking] `RuntimeIdentifier` No Longer Implies `SelfContained` Apps by Default #30038
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Adding the linux feed removal to 6.0.1xx as I figured out the issue #30037
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Bump sdk container version #30036
    7.0.2xx
  • Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29990
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use UTF-8 Encoding by Default On Windows On Non English Languages #29755
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add a reminder for the Area-AspNetCore PR authors to help with finding the schedule #29749
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Add support for destructor and explicit interface implementation generation. #30030
    Area-GenAPI
  • Create an SDK PR guide #29562
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Mention that preview SDKs in VS needs to be turned on in the dev guide #29870
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • [gh-23135] use parent path of manifest file path as rootConfigDirectory #24935
    Area-CLI
  • Move Template Discovery Test from dotnet/templating to dotnet/sdk #29628
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use Runtime ILLink package on SDK #29983
    Area-ILLink, DO NOT MERGE
